label: 解陣
対訳語: The ending of  special defensive measures.
説明文: The release, when not needed, of various units of the guards posted during royal ceremonies, accession ceremonies, royal progresses, or when there is thunder or other unusual happenings. Those happenings can include events such as the Kamo Festival. (Kokushi daijiten, vol. 5, p. 94) [賀茂祭]
